cause.description:
For every 10 people that join this cause, a generous donor will donate $1 to CHOSA! Please invite all your friends!
CHOSA takes a holistic approach to the community development process. We operate through partnerships with local organizations, enabling them to address the immediate needs of the children while simultaneously striving for long-term transformation of the social environment. This comprehensive approach is rooted in the realization that sustainable change will come from within the community when participation leads to local action, self-empowerment and community-owned development.
Check out www.chosa.org for more info.
Facebook recruitment goal: 100,000 people! Facebook fundraising goal: $10,000 dollars!
1. Children are 100% of our future
2. Communities have a right to control their own development.
3. Helping children requires helping the community as a whole
cause.mission: To identify and support community-based organizations (CBOs) who reach out and care for orphans and vulnerable children in South Africa.
cause.name: CHOSA: Children of South Africa
